title: When You Play Cards Against Humanity With The Meme Crew...
body:
And you realize how sick and perverted they REALLY are.

http://i.imgur.com/Ih7NinU.gif

http://i.imgur.com/RRPco3Q.jpg

http://38.media.tumblr.com/65858c6e5a62b18a6dd87d60b7106030/tumblr_niawogIszT1u55xnmo2_500.gif


But you still have fun


https://38.media.tumblr.com/a231d2ee8a62e34b580a73d001368f52/tumblr_inline_o0nt12Zifh1tzwkwy_500.gif

replies.body: Well you only played with me and UndyneUdying :P
Why wasn't I invited to this?
I let an Invite in the club :P only a few people showed up i'll do another tomorrow

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3c2YEQp3,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-07T06:48:44.323+0000)
>
> I let an Invite in the club :P only a few people showed up i'll do another tomorrow

Weird and perverted? COUNT ME IN!
Wait how come I wasnt invited to this club?
When is that? Who's invited?
Excuse me I was there.
{{champion:161}} What is this intimate get together of which you and the "Meme Crew" play the form of video entertainment known as "Cards Against Humanity"?

{{champion:161}} According to my research scans on the lifeforms who are acquainted with this "Cards Against Humanity" (or CAH, as they often abbreviate), Cards Against Humanity is some type of entertainment for human lifeforms in which they use small black and white pieces of carefully laminated paper to compete against each other in this "game". I figure that the origin of this game is some sort of twisted survival-of-the-fittest environment, as the one who "wins" this game is often placed with high regard and respect from his inferiors for possibly hours. From what I can understand, the goal of the game is to somehow collect as many of the black cards as possible by somehow using white cards. While my preliminary experimentation has not been able to determine what exactly is on these cards, my only guess is that it is a civilized battle of the wits that requires heavy thinking to decipher the meaning behind each and every card and how to use each card to its most effective point. These is this supposed "Card Czar", but I have not been able to find the nation from which he rules or even who the Card Czar is.
http://media.tumblr.com/d1627ca259bb0c3054b66fe4c1aabf4c/tumblr_inline_ms0k44oQ3s1qz4rgp.gif
u sick bastard... XD

Shame if i was in NA i would have fun to play with you guys :(

Feels like the Meme Crew is insanely fun to play with or against..
Trust me, the jokes never end when Laughing fish gets on the rift.
http://24.media.tumblr.com/babcb72d7c63df001562800b1a954833/tumblr_mqifb0KLWz1qib2iho1_500.gif
I like a fun game more than an overly serious game :)
When I play.... {{champion:412}} "Oh the eternity we shall spend together."
I... what? I feel like i should be in the target demographic for Thresh joke, but i dont get it
He's basically like hell's lead punisher right? So im implying im going to hell becuase of how i play CAH
You got to hell if you play Leona bot lane, not Thresh
You do realize who created this discussion, right?
Oh right XD, but you know what, Leona is the hardest champs I can think of to fight, so u kno wut
I'd have to go with Blitzcrank, if he's good and can land the majority of his hooks... I'd rather do the hokie pokie naked with Hitler

You can qss blitzcrank hook, you flash away from blitzcrank hook, you can play rammus. You can't flash\qss away from three sources of hard cc that all have stupid high damage with a proc on you that makes your adc do stupid damage.

But yeah, blitzcrank is really annoying, he's kind of like xin where he powerspikes on level 1 and never really lets that powerspike slip.
WHY WASN'T I INVITED?!

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3c2YEQp3,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-05-08T18:02:53.529+0000)
>
> WHY WASN'T I INVITED?!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/OXXgEmLZ-its-time-for-the-sunday-cards-against-humanity-game-d

Rar

One of 'em actually looks like th' representation of a Korean _league_ player...

It be like... He seemin' to be stuck on **_Cloud 9_** with that look...

**...**

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

_Forgive me, for I have sinned..._
I REALLY regret not doing that? Are we planning on doing this again sometime?
u were on when we were playing but u were always in game, I didn't get the chance to ask, but raptor is doing it again on Sunday at 8:30 pm est.
I'll try to join
Wait when did this happen?
yesterday night, raptor said we might do it again, stay sharp!

Cards Against Humanity?

I wish I'd been there. :(
